hero.title: 🐦‍🔥 Indomon Quest
hero.subtitle: Explore the world of Nusantara monsters. Capture, train, trade, and become a Founder. Buy Founder Pack now for

referral.title: exclusive, referral & real money
content: Indomon Quest is an Indonesian Text-Based RPG that combines exploration, monster collection, and a profession-based virtual economy.
🎮 Core Gameplay: Explore → Battle → Capture → Trade → Upgrade → Explore again.
🐲 Monster Collection: 100+ field monsters & 100+ prestige breeding monsters.
⚔️ Combat: Turn-based battle system with elements (Fire, Water, Earth, Wind, Spirit, etc).
🏭 Professions & Economy: 10 interconnected professions (Farmer, Miner, Blacksmith, etc) + 1 prestige (Breeder).
📈 Progression: Player & monsters up to level 100.
💎 Market & Monetization: All resources, items, and monsters can be traded on the Global Market; rewards can be cashed out, adventurer packs available from Bronze to Diamond.
🌍 Community Features: Guild, PvP Arena, Dungeon Raid, Seasonal Events with real-money prizes.
With strong progression, prestige breeding, and an economic ecosystem, Indomon Quest brings a unique, challenging RPG experience with a local Indonesian flavor.

quota.title: ⚡ Limited Founder Quota
quota.desc: 90% discount only for the first 10,000 players. Registration will be closed once quota is full.

reward.title: 🎁 Exclusive Rewards
reward.desc: Founder Pack contains monsters, equipment, potions & capture tools that will never be sold again after release.

early.title: 🚀 Early Access & Events
early.desc: Closed alpha/beta access, exclusive Founder events, and a chance to be one of the first Breeders.

referral.title: 💸 Monetization & Referral
referral.desc: Earn 10% referral bonus from friends’ purchases. Active after payment & verification. Rewards can be exchanged for cash up to 50% of total referral rewards.

collection.title: 🐲 Monster Collection
collection.desc: 100+ Field & 100+ unique Breeding monsters inspired by Nusantara, with more added as the game grows.

combat.title: ⚔️ Turn-based Combat
combat.desc: Strategic text battles, capture system, and unique skills for each monster.

economy.title: 🏭 Professions & Economy
economy.desc: Farmer, Miner, Blacksmith, Alchemist, Fisher & Chef, plus Breeder as prestige profession after maxing a main profession. All connected economically.

market.title: 🌐 Global Market
market.desc: Trade monsters, items & equipment in the global marketplace with trading pairs.

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.q4_2025: Closed Alpha (Founder only), core loop: explore, battle, capture, website & wiki (info + guides).
roadmap.q1_2026: Founder Beta & Pre-Registration: basic professions + Market + Early PvP Arena.
roadmap.q2_2026: Open Beta: Prestige Breeder unlock + leaderboard.
roadmap.q3_2026: Full Release: Cross-region updates, fiat event rewards, mobile optimization.
roadmap.post: Seasonal monsters, new professions, community-requested features.

earn.q: How can I earn money from this game?
earn.a: Players can earn rewards from events, selling monsters/items/equipment in the Global Market, and competitions with fiat prizes (via external payment).

packs.q: What’s the difference between Founder Packs?
packs.a: Each pack differs in monster rarity, number of potions, capture tools, and early access perks. Premium packs include exclusive items & badges.

funds.a: Funds are used for game development (hosting, dev, art, testing), referral rewards, and prize pools. All payments are recorded. Regular dev progress updates provided.

referral.a: Referral activates after login via Pack Purchase or Pre-Registration. Rewards are given when referrals purchase packs, payment confirmed & data recorded. Referral link appears in user dashboard.
